# R-Ladies Global

## What is R-Ladies?

- A global community of ladies who use R
- that seeks to _support_ and _inspire_ others
- through **teaching**, **sharing**, and **mentorship**
- check out more here: https://rladies.org/

# R-Ladies Bergen

## Who are we?

- Jonelle Dickow Villar:  
_Clinician who loves R_  
[https://www.uib.no/en/persons/ Jonelle.M.Dickow.Villar](https://www.uib.no/en/persons/Jonelle.M.Dickow.Villar)

- Julia Romanowska:  
_Data scientist who loves visualization and programming_  
https://jrom.bitbucket.io/homepage/

- Astrid Lunde:  
_Statistician who loves numbers_  
[https://www.uib.no/en/persons/ Astrid.Lunde](https://www.uib.no/en/persons/Astrid.Lunde)

## What is it all about?

- We are a group of cool people
- We gather roughly bi-monthly
- We _support_ each other by e.g., help with programming
- We _inspire_ each other through discussions and presentations
- We _learn_ from each other through tutorials

<br>

## How to join?

- create your profile at Meetup.com
- join our group _(check out the link below)_

## How to contribute?

We're always looking for people who want to help!

- If you want to take part in organizing a meeting, or would like to give a tutorial/talk

- If you or your company can support us financially or with practical things  

drop us a message on our page or via e-mail
